let-us-build.context: Nehemiah rallies the people to rebuild Jerusalem's walls
let-us-build.hebrew: לְכוּ וְנִבְנֶה אֶת־חוֹמַת יְרוּשָׁלַיִם... נָקוּם וּבָנִינוּ
let-us-build.english: Come, let us rebuild the wall of Jerusalem... Let us start building!

great-work.context: Nehemiah refuses to be distracted by enemies
great-work.hebrew: מְלָאכָה גְדוֹלָה אֲנִי עֹשֶׂה וְלֹא אוּכַל לָרֶדֶת
great-work.english: I am engaged in a great work and cannot come down

fifty-two-days.context: The wall completed in record time
fifty-two-days.english: The wall was finished... after fifty-two days

sword-and-trowel.hebrew: אֵין־אֲנַחְנוּ פֹשְׁטִים בְּגָדֵינוּ אִישׁ שִׁלְחוֹ הַמָּיִם
sword-and-trowel.english: We never took off our clothes, each kept his weapon

why-sad-face.context: The king notices Nehemiah's troubled heart
why-sad-face.english: Why does your face look so sad?

god-of-heaven.context: Nehemiah prays before answering the king
god-of-heaven.english: I prayed to the God of heaven
